author: Dr Sara Kayat
title: Doctor's Note: How to stay healthy during lockdown
description: A doctor explains the four pillars of health and how you can adhere to them during the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
With our usual routines going out window and the thought of staying in your pyjamas all day becoming ever more tempting, it is more important than ever to stay healthy during the lockdown.
